attributes.action: Nucular power should be the UK's main source or energy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is for the move of
nucular energy. The MPs are always
on about cutting down on carbon
emitions, well the simple answer is,
close down coal/oil/gas power stations
and open nucular ones.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
